title: II Simposio Peruano de Deep Learning spdl-2020

event: II Simposio Peruano de Deep Learning event_url: https://sites.google.com/view/spdl-2020

location: UTP address: street: 160, Tacna, Arica city: Arequipa region: Arequipa postcode: ‘04000’ country: Peru

summary: an introduction to natural language processing using deep learning approaches. abstract: Invited to talk about Natural Language Processing using Deep Learning techniques in the “II Simposio Peruano de Deep Learning”, SPDL 2020.
